column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Once a week I go to the grocery store to do some food shopping .
#id=2
#text=Before I left the house my wife gave me a list of things that we needed .
#id=3
#text=I grabbed my shopping cart and the list and started walking to the supermarket that was 2 blocks away .
#id=4
#text=When I got there I walked up and down the aisles looking for the items that were on the list .
#id=5
#text=As I found each item , I placed them into my shopping cart and crossed them off the list .
#id=6
#text=When I finally found everything we needed I made my way towards the check out line to pay for the food .
#id=7
#text=I found a cashier that did n't have anyone on her line and I made my way towards her .
#id=8
#text=I gave her each item one at a time and watched her scan and place them into bags for me .
#id=9
#text=After she was finished she told me the total amount and I gave her the money to cover the cost .
#text=She gave me my change and receipt then thanked me for shopping .
